attributes.action: Extra Bank Holidays for Baisakhi, Eid & Diwali
attributes.additional_details: This petition is for adding Extra 3 Holidays into UK Bank Holiday calender to respect Multicultural Society. I would like to request to all people representatives to support my petition to add Extra 3 Bank Holidays For Baisakhi (Main Sikh Festival Day), Eid ( Main Muslim Festival) and Diwali (Main Hindu Festival) these festivals deserve to have bank holidays as they are same respectful as Christmas for Christians.so i would like to request people of all communities and religions to support my e-petition in respect to have balance in society and will give fair time to all religions to celebrate and dedicate their day to their roots.
